imp.core.exceptions

Class NullParameterException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • imp.core.exceptions.IMPRuntimeException
            • imp.core.exceptions.NullParameterException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class NullParameterException
extends IMPRuntimeException
    Represents an exception when the user attempts to pass a null value to a parameter.
    Version:
    1.01
    Author:
    edmissonj
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • NullParameterException

        public NullParameterException(java.lang.String message,
                      int param)
        Represents an exception when the user attempts to pass a null value to a parameter.
        Parameters:
        message - The message describing the exception.
        param - the number of the parameter (0 based) that is causing the issue.

        Returns the index of the parameter that caused the exception.
